column1: Grim was a Rider of Rohan.
Grim settled in a dale that would later carry his name
column2: Grimslade. It would be inhabited by him and his descendants until the days of Grimbold in the War of the Ring.J.R.R. Tolkien
column4: "Index questions". Quoted in Wayne G. Hammond
column6: The Lord of the Rings: A Readers Companion
